bio: After being inside the house for so long, Hidabat fused with it. Now he really can't ever leave!

soultimate.name: Abodaballad
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drop foe's movement speed by 50% and Move Meter speed by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to decrease foes' speed for a time.

skill.effect: 7.5% HP restored every 2 sec when unseen by foes.
skill.name: Hide and Heal

name: Abodabat
